pageTitle: Deputy Prime Ministerâ€™s itinerary for Monday, November 25, 2019 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Edmonton, Alberta

4:00 p.m. The Deputy Prime Minister will meet with the Premier of Alberta, Jason Kenney.

Office of the Premier
Legislative Assembly of Alberta

Notes for media:

  • Photo opportunity at the beginning of the meeting.
  • Media should arrive no later than 3:30 p.m.

5:30 p.m. The Deputy Prime Minister will meet with the Mayor of Edmonton, Don Iveson.

Office of the Mayor
City Hall
1 Sir Winston Churchill Square

Notes for media:

  • Photo opportunity at the beginning of the meeting.
  • Media should arrive no later than 5:00 p.m.

7:00 p.m. The Deputy Prime Minister will deliver greetings at an event hosted by the Ukrainian Canadian Congress in honour of the former President of Ukraine, Petro Poroshenko.           

Chateau Louis Conference Centre
11420 117 Street Northwest

Notes for media:

  • Open coverage
  • Media should arrive no later than 6:30 p.m.
